name: Keyboard Wizard
description:
Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move.

 To cast illusions on yourself and make your ennemies freeze in terror, enter the words that appear on screen.

Press escape to pause the game.

Made by Team Lorem Ipsum

Level Designer:
Juliette Morin

Sound Designer:
Charles Tousignant

Programmers (UI):
Sara Brochu &
Mikael Gilbert

Programmers:
Hubert Boucher &
Kevin Clapperton &
Étienne Lazure

Assets:
0x72's Dungeon Tileset II (https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii) &
Music made with BeepBox (https://www.beepbox.co).
